languages.text: "Благодарю, благодарю! И вам с вашим прошением да поможет Император!"

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю, благодарю! И вам с вашим прошением да поможет Император!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: "Thank you, thank you! And may the Emperor aid you in your petition as well!"
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, благодарю! И вам с вашим прошением да поможет Император!"

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, thank you! And may the Emperor aid you in your petition as well!"

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, thank you! And may the Emperor aid you in your petition as well!"

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, thank you! And may the Emperor aid you in your petition as well!"

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, thank you! And may the Emperor aid you in your petition as well!"

languages.text: “谢谢你，谢谢你！也愿帝皇保佑你！”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, thank you! And may the Emperor aid you in your petition as well!"

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，谢谢你！也愿帝皇保佑你！”
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: «¡Gracias, gracias! ¡Que el Emperador {mf|le|la} ayude también con su solicitud!».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, thank you! And may the Emperor aid you in your petition as well!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Gracias, gracias! ¡Que el Emperador {mf|le|la} ayude también con su solicitud!».
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: 「ありがとう、ありがとう！あんたの嘆願にも、皇帝のご加護がありますように！」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, thank you! And may the Emperor aid you in your petition as well!"

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとう、ありがとう！あんたの嘆願にも、皇帝のご加護がありますように！」
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: « Merci bien ! Puisse l'Empereur vous aider à obtenir gain de cause également ! »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, thank you! And may the Emperor aid you in your petition as well!"

traits.locale_text: « Merci bien ! Puisse l'Empereur vous aider à obtenir gain de cause également ! »
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: "Danke, danke! Und möge der Imperator auch Euch bei Eurem Antrag unterstützen!"
languages.original_text: "Thank you, thank you! And may the Emperor aid you in your petition as well!"

traits.locale_text: "Danke, danke! Und möge der Imperator auch Euch bei Eurem Antrag unterstützen!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: "Teşekkür ederim, teşekkür ederim! İmparator, dilekçenizin kabulünde yardımcınız olsun!"
languages.original_text: "Thank you, thank you! And may the Emperor aid you in your petition as well!"

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkür ederim, teşekkür ederim! İmparator, dilekçenizin kabulünde yardımcınız olsun!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas
